## nova login

Login into the cloud instance.

### Synopsis

Login into the cloud instance.

```
nova login [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -e, --env string   For wandelbots internal development purposes. Environment to login into. (dev, stg, prod) (default "prod")
  -h, --help         help for login
```
